title: ROCAS Minimal Watch Face
summary: Minimal is a simple, slick 3Dynamic Watch Face for Android Wear devices.

description: Minimal is a simple, slick 3Dynamic Watch Face for Android Wear devices.Features:✰ Supports Round and Square Watches✰ Random 3D Wake Up animations (in Always On mode)✰ Mobile and Watch battery✰ Fit the Moto360 Chin frame✰ Full date✰ Low Bit ambient mode supportSupport us on Facebook: https://goo.gl/LXBFYA  Check out our Watch Face collection: https://goo.gl/nkwCHoIf you have any problems with the application, please don’t rate us 1-star and contact us directly at rocas.watchfaces@gmail.com.We’re committed to providing quality products and technical support to all our users. descriptionHTML:
Minimal is a simple, slick 3Dynamic Watch Face for Android Wear devices.

Features:

✰ Supports Round and Square Watches
✰ Random 3D Wake Up animations (in Always On mode)
✰ Mobile and Watch battery
✰ Fit the Moto360 Chin frame
✰ Full date
✰ Low Bit ambient mode support

Support us on Facebook: https://goo.gl/LXBFYA
Check out our Watch Face collection: https://goo.gl/nkwCHo

If you have any problems with the application, please don’t rate us 1-star and contact us directly at rocas.watchfaces@gmail.com.
We’re committed to providing quality products and technical support to all our users.



Made with love in Montreal♥
comments: No battery meters The icons show but no rings for either watch or phone battery. On a Moto 360. UPDATE:Your update fixed my issue. Awesome. Hoping to see some options like maybe percentage numbers instead of watch and phone icons. Love the effects.
Battery meter wrong Looks cool but both my battery meter showed less than 10%...pls fix it...latest update fixed the battery meters but now, the face is misaligned on my lg g watch?!
Broken on the Moto 360 v2 Lovely animation, however the bottom right portion of my watch goes glitchy when this face is selected.
Doesn't work Just got a moto360 2nd Gen, and it glitches and flashes when I try to use this face. Please update!
I can't believe how much I love this face. This is my favorite theme by far. Great animation and never tiresome. I would love to be able to customize the background or the colors.
I would love this if it worked on moto 360 2. The meters glitch when the screen is on. Fix and I will give 5 stars
recentChanges: - Fixed bug where the Battery levels would stay at 0 when "Always On" mode was OFF
- Fixed bug where the 3D animations would not play when "Always On" mode was OFF
